## createRateLimiter

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/utils/useful-stuff/ratelimiter.ts" sourceLine="255" packageName="commandkit" />

Creates a new rate limiter instance with the specified configuration



*Example*

```typescript
const limiter = createRateLimiter({
  maxRequests: 5,
  interval: 30000,
  storage: new CustomStorage()
});
```

```ts title="Signature"
function createRateLimiter(options: RateLimitOptions): RateLimiter
```
Parameters

### options

<MemberInfo kind="parameter" type={`<a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/interfaces/rate-limit-options#ratelimitoptions'>RateLimitOptions</a>`} />
